positions.title: MathWorks
positions.description:
Lead a team responsible for:
* Developing infrastructure and tools for all phases of Simulink custom block/blockset authoring including user interface, implementation, building, testing, and deployment.
* Extending core capabilities of Simulink, including modeling of attributes such as physical units.

positions.title:
Title
Application Support Engineer
positions.description:
* Provided technical support for users of MATLAB and Simulink - specialized in the Simulink Code Generation and MATLAB Deployment areas.
* Supported recruiting activities as Career Fair representative and interviewer.
* Worked with various business groups within MathWorks on several projects:
** Integration of Xilinx ISE with MATLAB/Simulink using TCL interface to allow a seamless workflow between Simulink HDL Coder and Xilinx Synthesis Tool.
** Developed a Simulink custom target for the MPC 5567.
** Designed and implemented training material on "Developing Simulink Embedded Targets" using the Arduino Duemilanove.
** Worked on an internal infrastructure project with the Simulink Code Generation Development team.
